meanings.definition: A person who practices or studies law.
meanings.sent1: My uncle is a lawyer and helps people with legal problems.
meanings.sent2: The lawyers in the courtroom were discussing the case with their clients.
meanings.sent3: Why did the group of lawyers bring a briefcase to the park? To have a legal picnic!
meanings.sent4: The lawyers were like knights in shining armor, defending their clients with legal expertise.
meanings.sent5: The image of lawyers in their black robes and wigs is iconic in the legal world.

meanings.definition: A professional who represents clients in legal matters.
meanings.sent1: The lawyers worked hard to ensure their clients received fair treatment in court.
meanings.sent2: During the negotiation, the lawyers presented strong arguments on behalf of their clients.
meanings.sent3: Why did the group of lawyers bring a scale to the office? To weigh the merits of their cases!
meanings.sent4: The lawyers were like skilled navigators, guiding their clients through the complex legal system.
meanings.sent5: The lawyers' dedication to their clients' cases was unwavering and admirable.
